none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 16, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
You ever feel like you're spending your entire life just playing catch-up? Taking a break from looking out the window to look in the mirror and reach backwards to grab the things that you missed as you were too busy just getting by? Well maybe the bright side of getting buried in missed opportunities is the joy of digging yourself out...and if Virginia's CRETINS are in that pile of loss then I advise adjusting the volume knob on your metaphorical shovel while you dig. This wax-ready 2013 slammer came before EPs on Vinyl Conflict and Deranged before silence fell over the band. Six tracks, nine minutes, pure rage.Â  CRETINS
https://cretinspunk.bandcamp.com/album/s-t-ep https://cretinspunk.bandcamp.com/album/meat-ep

seo.title: Cretins - Cretins demo  - Terminal Escape
